reviewText:
One of the best videos I gotten and i have gotten a lot.
The way Mr. Northrup explains allows me to get it.
Once he  explains I can actually do it.
Im half way through his tapes and I have mastered (at least understands) my camera.
I have taken classes at a local college and at so call Photo schools, receiving contradictory info.
With these videos I can now make  decisions as to whats the correct and most useful  way for me  to use my camera.
